text: Piero Bellotti (born 1 August 1942) is an Italian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman 70 kg at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Italy Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Turin
title: Piero Bellotti
